author: wtopstaff
title: Coyotes-Ducks Sums
text:
0 0—0 
First Period_1, Arizona, Duclair 1 (Hanzal), 3:16. 2, Arizona, Duclair 2 (Domi, Hanzal), 9:55 (pp). 3, Arizona, Domi 2 (Boedker, Michalek), 12:53. Penalties_Hagelin, Ana (slashing), 8:26; Michalek, Ari (interference), 10:04; Richardson, Ari, major (fighting), 17:26; Fowler, Ana, major (fighting), 17:26; Perry, Ana (tripping), 18:26. 
Second Period_4, Arizona, Duclair 3 (Rieder, Hanzal), 10:57. Penalties_Murphy, Ari (high-sticking), 1:02; Perry, Ana (roughing), 11:45; Cogliano, Ana (hooking), 19:08. 
Third Period_None. Penalties_Hanzal, Ari (hooking), 7:29; Rakell, Ana (hooking), 10:30; Bieksa, Ana (elbowing), 12:08. 
Shots on Goal_Arizona 10-7-12_29. Anaheim 11-15-11_37. 
Power-play opportunities_Arizona 1 of 6; Anaheim 0 of 3. 
Goalies_Arizona, M.Smith 3-0-0 (37 shots-37 saves). Anaheim, Khudobin 0-1-0 (8-5), Andersen (12:53 first, 21-20). 
A_15,172 (17,174). T_2:33. 
Referees_Steve Kozari, Ian Walsh. Linesmen_Shane Heyer, Brandon Gawryletz. Topics:
